verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him <S%H899><s%>, and the garments, and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the bullock <S%H6499><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, and the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>;
and assemble <S%H6950><s%> thou all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> at <S%H6950><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H5712><s%>; and the congregation was assembled <S%H6950><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be done <S%H6213><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and washed <S%H7364><s%> them with water <S%H4325><s%>.

And he put <S%H5414><s%> upon him the coat <S%H3801><s%>, and girded <S%H2296><s%> him with the girdle <S%H73><s%>, and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him with the robe <S%H4598><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> upon him <S%H2296><s%>, and he girded him with the skilfully woven band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and bound it unto him therewith <S%H640><s%>.
And he placed <S%H7760><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> upon him <S%H2833><s%>: and in the breastplate he put <S%H5414><s%> the Urim <S%H224><s%> and the Thummim <S%H8550><s%>.

And he set <S%H7760><s%> the mitre <S%H4701><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>; and upon the mitre <S%H4701><s%>, in front <S%H6440><s%>, did he set <S%H7760><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> plate <S%H6731><s%>, the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and anointed <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and all that was therein <S%H6942><s%>, and sanctified them.

And he sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> thereof upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%>, and anointed <S%H4886><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> and all its vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and the laver <S%H3595><s%> and its base <S%H3653><s%>, to sanctify them <S%H6942><s%>.
And he poured <S%H3332><s%> of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%>, and anointed <S%H4886><s%> him <S%H6942><s%>, to sanctify him.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>, and clothed <S%H3847><s%> them with coats <S%H3801><s%>, and girded <S%H2296><s%> them with girdles <S%H73><s%>, and bound <S%H2280><s%> head-tires <S%H4021><s%> upon them <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he brought <S%H5066><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And he slew <S%H7819><s%> it <S%H4872><s%>; and Moses took <S%H3947><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> with his finger <S%H676><s%>, and purified <S%H2398><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and poured <S%H3332><s%> out the blood <S%H1818><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it <S%H3722><s%>, to make atonement for it.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that was upon the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> of the liver <S%H3516><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and their fat <S%H2459><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burned <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

But the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and its skin <S%H5785><s%>, and its flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and its dung <S%H6569><s%>, he burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he presented <S%H7126><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>.
And he killed <S%H7819><s%> it <S%H4872><s%>; and Moses sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> into its pieces <S%H5409><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burnt <S%H6999><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%>, and the pieces <S%H5409><s%>, and the fat <S%H6309><s%>.

And he washed <S%H7364><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%> and the legs <S%H3767><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burnt <S%H6999><s%> the whole ram <S%H352><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: it was a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>: it was an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he presented <S%H7126><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>.

And he slew <S%H7819><s%> it <S%H4872><s%>; and Moses took <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof <S%H5414><s%>, and put it upon the tip <S%H8571><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%>, and upon the thumb <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and upon the great toe <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%>.

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the tip <S%H8571><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%>, and upon the thumb <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and upon the great toe <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%>, and the fat tail <S%H451><s%>, and all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that was upon the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> of the liver <S%H3516><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and their fat <S%H2459><s%>, and the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%>:

and out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, that was before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, he took <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%>, and one cake <S%H2471><s%> of oiled <S%H8081><s%> bread <S%H259><s%>, and one wafer <S%H7550><s%>, and placed <S%H7760><s%> them on the fat <S%H2459><s%>, and upon the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%>:

and he put <S%H5414><s%> the whole upon the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and upon the hands <S%H3709><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and waved <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them from off their hands <S%H3709><s%>, and burnt <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%> upon the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>: they were a consecration <S%H4394><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>: it was an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%>, and waved <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: it was Moses <S%H4872><s%>' portion <S%H4490><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and of the blood <S%H1818><s%> which was upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> it upon Aaron <S%H175><s%>, upon his garments <S%H899><s%>, and upon his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and upon his sons <S%H1121><s%>' garments <S%H899><s%> with him <S%H6942><s%>, and sanctified Aaron <S%H175><s%>, his garments <S%H899><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' garments with him <S%H899><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, Boil <S%H1310><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and there eat <S%H398><s%> it and the bread <S%H3899><s%> that is in the basket <S%H5536><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>, as I commanded <S%H6680><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat it <S%H398><s%>.
And that which remaineth <S%H3498><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and of the bread <S%H3899><s%> shall ye burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And ye shall not go out <S%H3318><s%> from the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, until the days <S%H3117><s%> of your consecration <S%H4394><s%> be fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>: for he shall consecrate <S%H4390><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
As hath been done <S%H6213><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, so Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%>, to make atonement for you <S%H3722><s%>.

And at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> shall ye abide <S%H3427><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3119><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that ye die <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H6680><s%>: for so I am commanded.
And Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all the things <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
